Articles.Content:
On 1/19/2016 at 7:02 AM, Majorjim said:

That made my day! You can see some of the parts have been put in funny places by updates but they still look cool cruising around together. Thank you! Maybe time to update the rover.

my friend enjoyed your land rover. and i love the feature of flap go down and go up. and i used it to go trekking. ill go trek in mountains at the top and see some easter eggs. check out my challenge http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/130263-go-in-orbit-of-sun-gos/#comment-2369453
Majorjim, ill advertise you to my youtube channel

35 minutes ago, Rigel Agar said:

Majorjim, ill advertise you to my youtube channel

That would be great, thank you!

19 hours ago, Majorjim said:

That would be great, thank you!

no problem. Ill do that cause thats just easy. this is my channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHwUKj74yd6qL95FKIcfkZQ

Love your ships, majorjim. Tried to dwnld rc saturn v but the link was dead

'error: dns probe'

this just me?

Just now, EVA_Reentry/Strangelove II said:

Love your ships, majorjim. Tried to dwnld rc saturn v but the link was dead

'error: dns probe'

this just me?

Thanks man! Yeah that link is dead now. All mediafire links have been broken. I am in the process of swapping the craft files to another place.

 That rocket was sadly broken by the 1.0+ updates. Engine nerfs at sea level killed it. It could live again but I am woking on four or five complex builds and I don't have much time for KSP these days..

 I will update the link as soon as I can.
So, what do you have next in store for us?

Just now, He_162 said:

So, what do you have next in store for us?

Well hi there, thanks for dropping by my page!

 I have finished both my Saturn V rockets, one very low part count one very high. I have a stunning shuttle that is on the back burner, probably after 1.1. I am super lazy at the moment.. All I have to do is take pics of the rockets, then post them. Even doing that at the moment tests my patients..

 So, yeah a quiet phase at the moment. I have lots of ideas and not much time..

1 hour ago, Majorjim said:

Well hi there, thanks for dropping by my page!

 I have finished both my Saturn V rockets, one very low part count one very high. I have a stunning shuttle that is on the back burner, probably after 1.1. I am super lazy at the moment.. All I have to do is take pics of the rockets, then post them. Even doing that at the moment tests my patients..

 So, yeah a quiet phase at the moment. I have lots of ideas and not much time..

Well, I will look forward to seeing them!

2 hours ago, He_162 said:

Well, I will look forward to seeing them!

You gave me a little push, I will try to get the Apollo craft out in the next few days.

3 hours ago, Majorjim said:

You gave me a little push, I will try to get the Apollo craft out in the next few days.

Awesome! I'll be waiting!

On 1/31/2016 at 7:12 PM, Majorjim said:

You gave me a little push, I will try to get the Apollo craft out in the next few days.

Awesome! I love the new stuff you are adding, slowly but surely, I used your hinge to make a small turreted vehicle today, but it doesn't seem to work as well when facing a vertical direction.

 

I will have to work on it a little before I post images of it in action

Edited February 12, 2016 by He_162

Just now, He_162 said:

Awesome! I love the new stuff you are adding, slowly but surely, I used your hinge to make a small turreted vehicle today, but it doesn't seem to work as well when facing a vertical direction.

 

I will have to work on it a little before I post images of it in action

Hey man, thanks again, I am just working on a short video for the Apollo craft. A lot of my craft where made a few years ago and are now comical or flat out broken. I still build as i find it very relaxing so I will continue to share the fruits of my labor!

 Yup the small thermo hinge is tricky, It does work well at certain angle. Having said that I made a prop hinge the size of two cubic struts but I am still tweaking it to run smoothly. Keep at it and post what you come up with. I am happy to have a look at it.
This is super cool!  I love how you recreated stuff in KSP.  You are very creative and talented - I'm jealous!

9 hours ago, Bobdabiulder said:

This is super cool!  I love how you recreated stuff in KSP.  You are very creative and talented - I'm jealous!

Well that is very nice of you to say Bobdabiuder! One does one's best.

   I have many, many more things in the works too!

Hi all,

 I added the two Selene apollo craft!

Thank you all so much for the messages and kind words!

MJ

I finally changed my YouTube name from the obscure JandHfilms (Don't ask..) To MajorJim!

  I am toying with the idea of putting more time and effort into that channel as it has been stagnant for years, just used as a repository for my KSP videos that I share here. So If anyone is interested in my old and new KSP videos and has any input they would like to give me, ideas, insults and such please feel free to do so on there. I now have a URL for the channel too:

http://www.youtube.com/c/MajorJimGaming

Thanks all!

MJ

Edited March 25, 2016 by Majorjim

Thx,

JR

The links to your AT-ST files are not working, can you send me those I'd like to put them into an upcoming video (or you could just fix the links).  Also the snowspeeder if you don't mind.

Edit:  It's OK I found the AT-ST craft file  that I had downloaded previously - I do still need the speeder though...

Hey man, it may have been a bit borked by updates so let me open it ingame first then I will re-upload it to KerbalX. Can you wait until tomorrow?

Some of the parts were borked, but that's OK I had to do a part reduction anyhow.  Don't worry though I won't zoom in that close so you won't notice the details anyway.  This is just a quick video, I'm hoping to have it out today...

JR

Edited March 29, 2016 by Jolly_Roger

Some very nice stuff in your channel, man. I enjoyed the Mars Direct clip a lot, and the new Selene Video is pretty awesome too!

BTW, how cool is that? In 1.1 we will be able to shut off the Radiators and stop them from glowing!

4 hours ago, Jolly_Roger said:

Some of the parts were borked, but that's OK I had to do a part reduction anyhow.  Don't worry though I won't zoom in that close so you won't notice the details anyway.  This is just a quick video, I'm hoping to have it out today...

JR

Ok cool man, yeah do what ever you want with it! It was made before the no offset mod so it's a mess of supporting cubic struts.

3 hours ago, Dafni said:

Some very nice stuff in your channel, man. I enjoyed the Mars Direct clip a lot, and the new Selene Video is pretty awesome too!

BTW, how cool is that? In 1.1 we will be able to shut off the Radiators and stop them from glowing!

Thanks man! I am very glad you liked it. It's my favorite too. And that news about the radiators is fantastic! Thank you for letting me know!
